117a2('dul ba): gshegs pa na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / / mthong ma thag tu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni shAkya'i rigs dga' ba las/ 'khor los
117a3('dul ba): sbyar ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs/ btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyi 'byor pa rnams kyang spungs nas/ rab tu byung ba de yin te/ de da ltar bsod snyoms la
117a4('dul ba): rgyus/ gal te bdag las bsod snyoms kyi zan bzhes na ni/ de la bdag gi dbul lo snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas/ lhung bzang bzed de/ sring mo gal
117a5('dul ba): te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir phul cig/ de nas de lhag par dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas/ dad pa drag
117a6('dul ba): pos bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa
117a7('dul ba): de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod pur nub par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
117b1('dul ba): ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni zhes bya ba nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes nas/ ngal
117b2('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba de mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bram ze'i bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bskal pa bcu gsum du log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur
117b3('dul ba): zhing / lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas/ srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs rgyas shin
117b4('dul ba): tu legs smon zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
117b5('dul ba): rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes sgra grags so/ / de'i khyo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des bdag gi chung mas dge slong go'u ta ma la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul
117b6('dul ba): bas/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
117b7('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / shes ldan go'u ta ma bdag gi sdum par byon tan/ bram ze son to// shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag gi mchis brang gis bsod snyoms
118a1('dul ba): bshos shig phul nas/ khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na mad dam/ bram ze bden no// kye goru ta ma khyod 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs
118a2('dul ba): nas rab tu byung na/ da bsod snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du/ ji ltar shes bzhin gyi brdzun gyi tshig gsung / sa bon 'di tsam gyi 'bras bu 'di'o zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/
118a3('dul ba): bram ze de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ bram ze ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga' yod dam/ kye go'u
118a4('dul ba): ma re zhig ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog/ n+ya gro d+ha 'di nyid du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re zhig gson cig/ kye go'u ta ma n+ya gro d+ha 'di'i shar phyogs na/ n+ya gro d+ha'i shing
118a5('dul ba): chen po zhig mchis te/ de'i ming gis grong 'di n+ya gro d+ha zhes bgyi'o// de'i 'og na shing rta lnga brgya ma reg cing / phan tshun mthun par mchis lags so// bram ze n+ya gro d+ha de'i sa bon tshad ji tsam zhig
118a6('dul ba): yod/ ci re zhig zhing rnang tsam mam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// re lde tsam mam/ til 'dru ba'i 'khor lo tsam mam/ shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam mam/ ba'i ko ba tsam mam/ bil ba tsam mam/
118a7('dul ba): ka pid tha'i 'bras bu tsam sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// kye go'u ta ma ye yungs kar gyi bzhi cha tsam mchis lags so// bram zes bon de tsam gyis 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skes so
118b1('dul ba): zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ shes ldan kon tam yid ches kyang rung / sa ches kyang rung / bdag gi mngon sum du gyur lags so// kye go'u ta ma re zhig zhing stug che Ta/ ser sgeg
118b2('dul ba): dogs tsha sgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su/ sa bon sar pa grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la/ dus dus su lhas char phab na/ des na shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so// de nas bcom
118b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' sprul pa/ bram ze khyod kyis ji lta bur// zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar// de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum
118b4('dul ba): mo/ / ji ltar bram ze khyod kyi sa bon ni// chung dang shin tu shing chen de mthong ba// bram ze ngas kyang sa bon chung ngu dang // phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
118b5('dul ba): nas ljags brkyang bas dbu sgra la thug pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs nas bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze ji snyam du sems/ gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil
118b6('dul ba): 'khor thams cad yog par byed pa de/ cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun gyi tshig gsung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
118b7('dul ba): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi ljags ni sgyu med bden pas bskyed pa dag/ cig mi bden pa ni gsung bar 'gyur srid dam// bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pas// de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes
119a1('dul ba): rtogs par bya ba'i rigs/ / de nas bram ze de mngon par dad nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang // bag la zhal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas
119a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa
119a3('dul ba): bdag ni 'phags so/ / mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dag
119a4('dul ba): bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
119a5('dul ba): dga' nas yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spun snga nas song ngo // / sdom la/ krim pi la dang sbrul gdugs
119a6('dul ba): dang / / ma thul dang yul 'khor skyong // glang chen grong dang grong khyer che// srug na dang ni bram ze'i grong // grong khyer nag po ro hi ta// gsing ma can dang de bzhin du// dga' ba 'phel bas tshigs su ni//
119a7('dul ba): byas te yang dag brjod pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das krim bi lar byon nas/ krim bi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa krim pi la la
119b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ krim bi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtsams te bsgom pa khyod la bshad kyis/ de legs par rab tu 'on la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal
119b2('dul ba): pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa krim pi la cang mi smra'o// lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/ lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// tshe dang ldan pa kri ma bi la la
119b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa krim pi la khyod la ston pa gsung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'tshal to// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma rab tu 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
119b4('dul ba): bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
119b5('dul ba): la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te bsgom pa bshad na/ de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid
119b6('dul ba): la zung zhig dang bshad do/ / 'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/ dbugs brngubs so zhes stob ste zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog pa'i rjes
119b7('dul ba): su lta zhing dbugs phyung ba slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes
120a1('dul ba): @#bya ba nas/ sras kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyas te/ lus sa grus kyi rjes susta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'a'ags pa'i dran thos
120a2('dul ba): la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// kun dga' bo dper na/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig
120a3('dul ba): brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas shar phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur
120a4('dul ba): ram btsun pa 'gyur lags so/ / de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i
120a5('dul ba): pabar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas/ sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo
120a6('dul ba): zhes slob bo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod
120a7('dul ba): rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs nas zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i
120b1('dul ba): par gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor spong ba dang / sems rab tu dga'
120b2('dul ba): ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob bo// sems rnam par grol bar
120b3('dul ba): byed cing dbugs phyung na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed
120b4('dul ba): pa yod par shes te/ mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o// de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas/ chos rnams
120b5('dul ba): la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten brtsigs
120b6('dul ba): par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/
120b7('dul ba): btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par
121a1('dul ba): shes te/ kun dkar po de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te bsgoms pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri bor zhig tu byon no// ri bor che
121a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan
121a3('dul ba): pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhang po la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te
121a4('dul ba): de'i gdul ba'i dus shes nas/ drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so// de nas drang srong des smras pa/ dge slong 'dug cig/ bram ze rnams kyi bsti gnas 'dir ma 'jug cig
121a5('dul ba): des smras pa/ nga yang bram ze yin no// drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze khyod la gsang byed med// blugs gzar yang ni yod ma yin// khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min/ bram ze/
121a6('dul ba): bdag ces ci ste sgra// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze nga yin ngo tsha shes// gsang byed blugs gzar shes rab nyid// chu rgyun rtag 'bab dang pa ni
121a7('dul ba): nga yi ril ba spyi blugs yin/ / nang du legs par mnyam gzhag pa'i// bden pa kho bo me mchod do// yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis// nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed// gal te de ltar gyur na yang
121b1('dul ba): dge sbyong mgo reg la ni 'dir skabs mi 'byed do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas/ mtsho bran dang nye bzhig tu song nas/ shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug
121b2('dul ba): gode nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa des bsams pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba
121b3('dul ba): yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtson par bya'o snyam ste/ klu de gnas nas byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lus la lan bdun du dkris te/ steng nas mgo'i
121b4('dul ba): gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/ / drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal ba la ma bsams na/ drang srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas/ de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems te/
121b5('dul ba): rab tu byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te/ bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste blta bar brtsams pa na/ des de mthong
121b6('dul ba): nas smras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes nas smras
121b7('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lags sam/ drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so// 'phags pa don ci zhig la byon/ khyod nyid kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so// tshur spyon bcom ldan
122a1('dul ba): 'das kyi drung du bzhud do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zhang po khrid nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
122a2('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba
122a3('dul ba): 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
122a4('dul ba): rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas/ drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/ de nas stan las langs
122a5('dul ba): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
122a6('dul ba): bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par
122a7('dul ba): spong pa sprasmad par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snam
122b1('dul ba): sbyar gyon pa'i yus ldan zhing / mod la dbang po rab zhi gnas gyur te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' bar gyur// ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang
122b2('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po song ba dang / klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig pu mi dga' bar gyur nas/ de nas ri bor der yams kyi nad dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha
122b3('dul ba): byang du mngon par sprul nas bsti gnas der song ste gnas so/ / de nas ri bor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de bsti gnas der lhags nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen
122b4('dul ba): po bdag cag la yams kyi nang byung na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi/ drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nyid du shog la 'dug cig dang zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas ri bor na
122b5('dul ba): gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de/ phyogs der lhags nas gnas so// phyogs der sbrul gyis gdugs byas pas sbrul gdugs sbrul gdugs shes bya bar grags te/ dad pa can rnams
122b6('dul ba): kyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma thul na 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gras song pa rnams kyi a
122b7('dul ba): mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi sgyus
123a1('dul ba): la gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag ci gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang /
123a2('dul ba): chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin zhing / skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o// mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
123a3('dul ba): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/ gang zhig yod na ci la brten nas ci la mngon par zhen te/ bdag ni ci yin rjes su lta ba rnams la mya
123a4('dul ba): ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag sa skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par
123a5('dul ba): 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di
123a6('dul ba): nyid dge slong rnams la bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu zhom la yid la zung zhig dang
123a7('dul ba): bshad do/ / dge slong dag gzugs yod pa na/ gzugs la brten nas gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang /
123b1('dul ba): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag la skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ dge slong dag tshor
123b2('dul ba): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod na/ rnam par shes pa la brten nas/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen te/ rnam par shes pa ni bdag yin no zhes rjes
123b3('dul ba): su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skye ba ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas
123b4('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
123b5('dul ba): du'o/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na
123b6('dul ba): kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas tshor ba la
123b7('dul ba): tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan
124a1('dul ba): thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par thob par byed cing / dbugs brngub bo zhes slob pa dang / sems
124a2('dul ba): rnam par grol bar byed cing / dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing / dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba/ de'i tshe 'phags
124a3('dul ba): ba'i nyan thos sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na nub phyogs nas khyogs
124a4('dul ba): 'ong ba de nyid bya'o/ / de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba de dag nub pas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so//
124a5('dul ba): de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ 'di lta ste/ lam po che'i
124a6('dul ba): bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas ni bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/
124a7('dul ba): rdul kyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ras/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags
124b1('dul ba): pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo de ltar na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brten nas bsgoms pa yin no// bcom ldan
124b2('dul ba): 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can nabang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal na bzhugs so// bang mdzod stug po can gyi
124b3('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal
124b4('dul ba): na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'dus shing phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang
124b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim
124b6('dul ba): bdag rnams la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs pastod par badzad/ yang dag par rab tu
124b7('dul ba): dga' bar mdzad do/ / // 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po sum cu bzhi pa// de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing
125a1('dul ba): @'dug par gyur to/ / de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na/ khrim/
125a2('dul ba): pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu stsal gyis dag pa ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa rnam par byang ba
125a3('dul ba): sdud pa 'di ni sla ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas
125a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag
125a5('dul ba): par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
125a6('dul ba): mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis/ bang mdzod stug po can
125a7('dul ba): gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
125b1('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das/
125b2('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o// khyim bdag gi bu/ pha dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/ btsun pa ma gnang ngo // khyim bdag gi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
125b3('dul ba): nyan thos rnams ni/ pha dang ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ba rab tu 'byin pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed do// btsun pa bdag gis ci nas pha dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi lags so// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor
125b4('dul ba): skyong / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / pha dang mal 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag dang pa
125b5('dul ba): yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ / bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/ khyod nged kyi bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun
125b6('dul ba): pa med pa yin pas/ khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral grang / gson bzhin du ga la gtang / yab yum gal te re zhig gnang na legs/ gal te ma gnang na deng slan chad 'tshal ma yang
125b7('dul ba): mi 'tshal/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal lo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad par byas so// gnyis dang gsum nas/ bdun gyi bar du zan bcad pa
126a1('dul ba): byas so/ / de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ba dang mas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/
126a2('dul ba): khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin pas/ khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka' 'o// rab tu dben pa bya dka' 'o// gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga'
126a3('dul ba): ba dka' 'o/ / gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni mnags dkar 'o// bu yul 'khor skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig/ sbyin
126a4('dul ba): pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ de skad smras nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas rko du
126a5('dul ba): rnams la bcol ba/ kye nye du ngag re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slong zhig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ khyim
126a6('dul ba): bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyod ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas/ bsod nams ngag gyis
126a7('dul ba): shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de skad smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang me smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pa dang mas/ yul 'khor
126b1('dul ba): skyong gi ne'u sngangs rnams la bcol ba/ kye gzhon nu dag re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slong zhig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams kyis/ yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces
126b2('dul ba): smras so/ / kye sras nges pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyod ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags la zhes bya ba nas/ bsod nams dag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar snga
126b3('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ / de skad smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas gzhon nu dag gis/ yul 'khor skyong kyi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab
126b4('dul ba): yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig brgya rab tu 'byung du gnong dang / gal te dga' bar gyur na 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi dga' ba
126b5('dul ba): gyur na yang / bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mchis gzhon nu bdag cag la gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na/ de bzhin du gnang bar bya'o// de nas yul
126b6('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs dag gis/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces spras so// des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ pa dang mas gnang skye/ 'a
126b7('dul ba): skad ces gal te tha rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na'o zhes kyang zer ro/ / shes ldan dag blte bar bya'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs brtsengasas/
127a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug
127a2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni pha dang mas gnang lags kyis/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs
127a3('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyim bdag
127a4('dul ba): gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
127a5('dul ba): bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung / / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ bang mdzod stug po can du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing
127a6('dul ba): gshegs te/ rims kyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas
127a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsnyen par rdzogs te lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/
127b1('dul ba): sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na/ pa dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pa yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa de
127b2('dul ba): mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/
127b3('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa sngon bdag
127b4('dul ba): gis khyim par gyur pa na/ pha dang ma la blta bar bgyi'o zhes g.yar gyis blangs pas/ bdag g.yar gyis blangs pa de mthar 'byin du mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
127b5('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing / khyad par mdzad nas/ thugs la mdzad cing / thugs la mdzad nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs
127b6('dul ba): kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim na gnas pa 'am/ sogs 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no snyam du mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la
127b7('dul ba): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / yul 'khor skyong song la sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni sgrol zhig/ ma grol ba rnams ni grol bar gyis shig/ dbugs ma phrin pa rnams ni
128a1('dul ba): dbugs phyung zhig/ yongs su mya ngan las sa 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das
128a2('dul ba): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe
128a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod
128a4('dul ba): snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log nas gnas ma la ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab ste/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas/ bang
128a5('dul ba): mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste/ rim gyis spyad pa spyod cing rgyu ba na/ bang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal du 'dug go/ de nas
128a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ bang mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de rim
128a7('dul ba): byis bang mdzod stug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song nas/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha bar sgo'i khyams na skyes pa skra mkhan gyis
128b1('dul ba): rgyu pa smra rnam pa na/ cha dang ldan pa yul la bar gyu shrItshe dang ldan pa yum batsha kyang ga drung du 'dug pa 'thong ngo // mamang nas papa zer bar byed de/ dge slong
128b2('dul ba): reg lo ni ngag gis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/ 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung
128b3('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo rig po ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi khyim nas rgya gagos gtogs pa
128b4('dul ba): ni sbyin pa yang mthob/ bskrad kyang ma po smad pa dang / sbyar ba sbyar bar phyir byung ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi skyon gyi zan mo rgan mo zhig/ zan rngon rul pa na
128b5('dul ba): lon pa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs te sgor byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi zan mo rgan mi de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bran mo rgar mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//
128b6('dul ba): sring mo gal te zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na/ kho bos bzas lhung bzed 'dir chug cig/ 'phags pa gsol cig/ de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo des zan drin rul
128b7('dul ba): pa zhag lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bzhin dang / sna dang / smra dngags ngag gi mtshan ma shin tu lags
129a1('dul ba): par bzung nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// rje'i sras yul 'khor skyong lags sam/ sring mo kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so// de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan pa
129a2('dul ba): de rings pa rings pa tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sras yul
129a3('dul ba): 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas lag pa g.yon pas skra bsdus nas ras
129a4('dul ba): yug cig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ rtsig drung
129a5('dul ba): zhig tu 'dug nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// yul 'khor skyong
129a6('dul ba): khyod dang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring po zhig lon na/ ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan dron rul ba zhag lon pa khyod kyi ze bar yang ji ltar 'gror btab/ khyim bdag
129a7('dul ba): khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na/ rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang mthob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang / myur bskur bar byung ngo // bu yul 'khor skyong yin par kho bos mi shes mod
129b1('dul ba): gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig/ bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo// khyim bdag bzod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
129b2('dul ba): 'khor skyong la yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas/ rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ yul 'khor
129b3('dul ba): skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu yul 'khor skyong yun ring zhig lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyis kye re zhig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du chos la sta gon gyis shig dang / de la bu yul
129b4('dul ba): 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma rang nyid kyis snod du btsos nas sta gon byas so// de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
129b5('dul ba): skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po/ gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi
129b6('dul ba): mthong ba spungs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la/ bud med kyi rnams kyi bud med kyi nor dang /
129b7('dul ba): bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang / bud med kyi khung pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di rnyed cig yod do// gzhan yang khyod kyi ba'i ni/ mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang /
130a1('dul ba): stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du ma yod na/ pha rol gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ du yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la/ 'dod pa dga' la yang yongs
130a2('dul ba): su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag kyang thong zhig/ bsod nams ngag kyang gyis shig/ khyim bdag gi chung sa khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/ bdag gis
130a3('dul ba): gdams shing rjes su bstan to/ / bu yul 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig/ bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang / khyod kyi tshig la bdag dang bas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du sems so//
130a4('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur khyod kyis sha na'i ras skye sar pa byos la/ gser dang sa le'i sbram gyis khong ste/ shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gting zab pa gang
130a5('dul ba): na yod pa der bor cig/ gzhi de las khyod kyi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/ de nas
130a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma nus so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
130a7('dul ba): gi mas/ mna' ma la bcol ba/ kye bag sar re zhig ji lta bu'i mnyes pa rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos
130b1('dul ba): rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis 'dug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ bu yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na
130b2('dul ba): dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkru ba dang / dri rnams kyis byug pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams
130b3('dul ba): kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la/ bu yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces
130b4('dul ba): gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas
130b5('dul ba): ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /
130b6('dul ba): bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i man
130b7('dul ba): ba rnams kyis mnye ba dang / khru ba rnams kyis bkru ba dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang // rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs
131a1('dul ba): pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras so// rje'i sras gang gi slad du
131a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni/ lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma 'dzin
131a3('dul ba): no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
131a4('dul ba): pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na/ ci mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste/ ci mtho ba tsam lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod
131a5('dul ba): cig ces/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byed de
131a6('dul ba): rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zod nas/ lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyur
131a7('dul ba): bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltos shig sus ni nor bu dang /
131b1('dul ba): rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas kyang // nad dang slu ba'i chos can de// brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin// skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing // mig ni mig sman gyis bskus pa'ang // byis pa rmongs par byed
131b2('dul ba): nus kyi/ / pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la// rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// mig sman gsar
131b3('dul ba): gyis bkra byas shing / / rus pa'i lus ni brgyan pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// ri dgas shor bas rI btsugs nas// ri dgas gzung ba ma nus ltar/
131b4('dul ba): rngon pa'o dod 'bod bcug la// zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang mal chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
131b5('dul ba): bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug
131b6('dul ba): bo can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sman
131b7('dul ba): pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag
132a1('dul ba): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kA ye nang rje khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can gyi
132a2('dul ba): tshal phyag dar byos shig/ sang nga der skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams
132a3('dul ba): cang phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/
132a4('dul ba): rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung
132a5('dul ba): bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis
132a6('dul ba): ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya la sbran par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha
132a7('dul ba): gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing bzhugs la/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye na/
132b1('dul ba): bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lha nga de'i dus la bab
132b2('dul ba): par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kA ye nang rje tshur/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du sngogs shig/ de la nga zhon nas deng kho nas shes
132b3('dul ba): ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ / lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya
132b4('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bcibs pa bzang so bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
132b5('dul ba): de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la lta ba dang bsnyen pa kun bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji
132b6('dul ba): tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab
132b7('dul ba): bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags
133a1('dul ba): pas/ bzhed na bdag kyang stan la gsar drongs shig/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag yul 'khor skyong gyis bdag stan lag yar
133a2('dul ba): drang bar 'tshal lo/ / rgyal po chen po gad na mchis kyis/ gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon
133a3('dul ba): du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po ko'u
133a4('dul ba): rab byas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa 'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa 'am/ gtugs
133a5('dul ba): bar gyur na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni ko'u rab bya
133a6('dul ba): yin la/ longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/ 'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal ba dag la bgo bsha' bya yis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skong tshur
133a7('dul ba): khyod 'dug la/ 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag thong shig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po cha ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pas bdag
133b1('dul ba): mgron du 'bod kyi/ 'tsham pas ni ma lags so// khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du yang ma 'bod cig/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang
133b2('dul ba): 'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul
133b3('dul ba): 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med la/ slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / bang mdzod stug po
133b4('dul ba): can 'dir gnos shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na/ rgyal po chen
133b5('dul ba): po sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo/ / gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na// shes ldan yul 'khor
133b6('dul ba): skyong la bdag zhu lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gsungs shig/ thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o// kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/
133b7('dul ba): de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
134a1('dul ba): bzhi gang zhe nas/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang
134a2('dul ba): longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa'o/ / kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs/ gtugs par gyur nas/
134a3('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na/
134a4('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te/ ngang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de rga bas
134a5('dul ba): yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams na sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di ni rga bas yongs su
134a6('dul ba): zhams pa zhes bya'o/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang
134a7('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nur thor bu lang tshol bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa
134b1('dul ba): yin te/ gang gi tshe/ rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / cha ba dang / brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe/ ne du rnams mchims
134b2('dul ba): brnangs shing du bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul
134b3('dul ba): 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // de la ni
134b4('dul ba): kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi 'dod do/ / kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu na pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nang tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di
134b5('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ bdag ni na ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nang tshabs che bas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par bla ba ma yin/ mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/
134b6('dul ba): mal bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams
134b7('dul ba): bskra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan
135a1('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya
135a2('dul ba): ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing / nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par
135a3('dul ba): 'ju ba'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil bas ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha dro ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs
135a4('dul ba): pa dang / 'chos dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
135a5('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor skyong nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha tag nas/
135a6('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha tag pas/ ma la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar
135a7('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nye du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nye dus yongs
135b1('dul ba): su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
135b2('dul ba): khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni/ ko'u rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pa/ bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul
135b3('dul ba): 'khor skong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong bya ba nas/ rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su
135b4('dul ba): nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi longs spyod ni bsrabs pa dang /
135b5('dul ba): yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur gyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de longs spyod yongs su nyams pa yongs su nyams
135b6('dul ba): bas sgra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni longs spyod kyi yongs su zhams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs
135b7('dul ba): su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po can 'di na// rigs
136a1('dul ba): mchog dang rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos
136a2('dul ba): rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ ngang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod ngo do// rgyal po chen po bzhi
136a3('dul ba): po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis
136a4('dul ba): yid byung nas/ rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig
136a5('dul ba): rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin//
136a6('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang
136a7('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / / bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing / rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul
136b1('dul ba): 'khor skyong gis don de nyid ci nas/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing / rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i ni ngon rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du
136b2('dul ba): gsol/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las
136b3('dul ba): dgongs te gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am/ nyi shu rtsa
136b4('dul ba): lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tshol bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ zhams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe 'am/ kha dogo gam/
136b5('dul ba): stobs sam/ smyu ngags sam/ srid du 'am/ sboms su mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag po nyi shu 'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par
136b6('dul ba): gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nyams rtsal bango ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe 'am/ kha dog
136b7('dul ba): gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ srid du 'am/ sboms su 'am/ smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ni bdag mchod kyis lo brgyad cu lon pas nas/
137a1('dul ba): 'khogs/ gtugs te/ bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang / langs pa yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
137a2('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de
137a3('dul ba): bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag
137a4('dul ba): rangs te bzod do/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni
137a5('dul ba): rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gang pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus
137a6('dul ba): mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rgya dang / shing d+hU pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang
137a7('dul ba): bro gar len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag/ bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms
137b1('dul ba): ra na pa'o / sasus sna da / 'jig ma ng+ge med pas smranas me pa yin nas ngas pang/ sa sa gi
137b2('dul ba): s ci la dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po'i de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyi ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis
137b3('dul ba): sam/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag la mchis te/ da ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do// rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang // dran dang /
137b4('dul ba): las byed pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rgya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang /
137b5('dul ba): gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa
137b6('dul ba): tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma
137b7('dul ba): lags so/ / gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gang pa dang / sgra mayin dang /
138a1('dul ba): khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta t+ya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol
138a2('dul ba): bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dba' ba/ rtul bod pa/ rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la byung zhing
138a3('dul ba): skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag baba' zhig sdug bsngal drag
138a4('dul ba): po rtsa ba pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo // rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing
138a5('dul ba): gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu
138a6('dul ba): bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod
138a7('dul ba): pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/
138b1('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
138b2('dul ba): du'o/ / gang dag bdag mchin rjes bzhin 'bring la/ 'greng ma greng ba dang / zhal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dgra mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyod 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni
138b3('dul ba): thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod
138b4('dul ba): kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid
138b5('dul ba): du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba
138b6('dul ba): nas/ rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma
138b7('dul ba): lags so/ / kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten
139a1('dul ba): thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang
139a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/
139a3('dul ba): bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing
139a4('dul ba): gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos
139a5('dul ba): rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan
139a6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ / bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces// 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing
139a7('dul ba): sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong ba dag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang /
139b1('dul ba): bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol pas chog mi shes pa
139b2('dul ba): yin no zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin
139b3('dul ba): du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du semaso// khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod
139b4('dul ba): rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las/ shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa/ yid ches pa brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas/ de la 'di skad ces/
139b5('dul ba): bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na/ de na bdag gi ldong 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/
139b6('dul ba): lha ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te gzhom pa dang / choms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo zhes smra na/ rgyal
139b7('dul ba): po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra ma drang zhing / drangs nas bcom ste rnal du 'god dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis ljongs
140a1('dul ba): de dag/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i gnon pas/ dra ma drang drang ba dang dram drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom nas
140a2('dul ba): rnam du dgod du rung bar shes na/ ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs zhing / dra ma drangs nas bcom lda/ bcom nas rnal du 'god do// bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo//
140a3('dul ba): / 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po sum cu lnga pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
140a4('dul ba): 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes
140a5('dul ba): mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do//
140a6('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas/ gnas brtan
140a7('dul ba): dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi// de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing // nor rnams rnyed nas gtong
140b1('dul ba): bar mi byed la/ / phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong // mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa// thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni// rgya mtsho tshun chad
140b2('dul ba): kyis kyang mi chog ste/ / chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad// mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag/ yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas// chog mi shes
140b3('dul ba): pas rang gi lus bor te/ / sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste// dga' bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min// 'chi ba na ni nor rjes
140b4('dul ba): 'brang mi 'gyur/ / nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin// spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang // snying du sdug pa'i tshogs 'di 'dus nas ni// kye ma kyi hud 'di ni brlab
140b5('dul ba): gyur ces/ / skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gi ngu// de ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas ni// me sbar nas ni de nas sreg par byed// rang gi las kyi sems can de khrid nas//
140b6('dul ba): de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs// 'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skye// 'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chi 'gyur zhing // gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur//
140b7('dul ba): skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no// phyug po 'am yang na bkren pa 'am brtan po 'am// bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong nas// brtan po de yis nams kyang
141a1('dul ba): yogs mi 'gyur/ / bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo// blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed cing // de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing //
141a2('dul ba): mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol// shes rab nor rnams kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de yis bdag nyid shes pas
141a3('dul ba): bdag nyid rig/ srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma gtogs pas// blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin// phran tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa'am// mthu yis gzhan
141a4('dul ba): dag las ni gang 'phrog pa/ / zhes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas// zhing tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzung nas ni// sdig
141a5('dul ba): pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom/ / de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni// 'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis bcom// shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni// gzhon
141a6('dul ba): dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung / / 'dod pa sna tshogs sdug cing yid 'ong ba// rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'jogs// 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur/
141a7('dul ba): 'dod pa yod na kho na dang 'jigs pa skye// de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste// dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin// de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
141b1('dul ba): gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rangs nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon
141b2('dul ba): pab dang / bram ze zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom
141b3('dul ba): gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyi stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba de/ rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
141b4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar song nas/ tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can mig tu sdug pa dang // dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan// mi 'dul
141b5('dul ba): kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha/ / srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
141b6('dul ba): 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod spur nub par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba
141b7('dul ba): byas nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/ zhes bya ba nas/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo
142a1('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram zes de bzhin
142a2('dul ba): gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/
142a3('dul ba): 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs
142a4('dul ba): rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'dis
142a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
142a6('dul ba): dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu
142a7('dul ba): nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sprin zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang
142b1('dul ba): lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' bar gyur to// wA ra NA si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod
142b2('dul ba): ba de la/ bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze grang ba'i dus la bab kyis/ rgyal po de'i spun sngar song la/ rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang / gal te na grang
142b3('dul ba): ba'i skyabs cung zad thob par 'gyur ro/ / de song ba las/ ji tsam na rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo // bram ze des bsams pa/ ci bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/ 'on te glang
142b4('dul ba): po che dam pa la snyam pa la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas/ re zhig glang po che
142b5('dul ba): dam pa mngon par bstod par bya'o snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sa srungs bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs ltar// mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mdog
142b6('dul ba): dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa/ / glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags// de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug
142b7('dul ba): cing yid 'ong ba/ / mi rnams mig 'phrog dga' ba skyed pa gang // de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyis// khyod la zong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang
143a1('dul ba): po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngal 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis
143a2('dul ba): bstod pas/ ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no// da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas yang 'di rang byang chub tu lung bstan to//
143a3('dul ba): grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// yul srug nar gshegs pa dang / yul srug nar bram
143a4('dul ba): ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / thos pas rgyags par gyur nas/ bdag dang 'dra bar ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes sgrogs shing rnam par sgrogs
143a5('dul ba): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do// bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas dge sbyong go'u
143a6('dul ba): ta ma yul srug nar byon no zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyis/ ci bdag
143a7('dul ba): las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nas 'on te ma yin/ ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de byung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun
143b1('dul ba): nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas
143b2('dul ba): bzang po mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no snyam
143b3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ma mthong nas/ de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas
143b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyis thong zhig/ gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang / 'on kyang chos nyon mongs su zad
143b5('dul ba): kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug
143b6('dul ba): tor mi mthong ngo zhes mthos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na/ khyod kyis khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/ tsan ngan sa mchog
143b7('dul ba): las byas pa'i mchod sdong nying yod kyis/ de phyung la gzhol cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni de yin no// bram ze dbang pos bsams
144a1('dul ba): pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas/ de rings pa rings par song nas me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi
144a2('dul ba): 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to// de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsams pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa
144a3('dul ba): yin gyis/ song la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga'
144a4('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
144a5('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu
144a6('dul ba): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas spras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang
144a7('dul ba): chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon
144b1('dul ba): par dad lags so/ / de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
144b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis tsan ngan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
144b3('dul ba): bram ze gnang gis song la shoms shig/ de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu/ rim gro chen pos mchod sdod de bsgreng nas dus mchod chen po bshams so// bram ze dang
144b4('dul ba): khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang rten dge bar gyur cig ces bya bar rig nas/ rtswa ku shas btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na/ dbang po'i dus
144b5('dul ba): mchod ces bya bar grags so/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ mu stegs can rnams ni spa bkong // lha dang mi rnams ni dga'
144b6('dul ba): bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni yi rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing / kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so//
144b7('dul ba): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bram ze'i grong du gshegs so// mu stegs can rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rings pa
145a1('dul ba): rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lhags nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis smras na/ 'phag
145a2('dul ba): pa dag de ci zhig/ kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni mthong gis/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag
145a3('dul ba): cag gi rgud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa dum bu med par byed par 'gyur
145a4('dul ba): ro/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho nas bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma
145a5('dul ba): rung ngo / / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad na ni 'khod par bya'o// bzhugs shig gsad par bgyi'o zhes/ de rnams lag na dbyug pa
145a6('dul ba): dang gzhu thogs/ khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus nu shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang du 'dod/ de rnams kyis spras
145a7('dul ba): pa/ dgra gsad pa'i phyir ro// khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o// shes ldan dag gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra bzhig yin/ shes ldan pa
145b1('dul ba): slar log cig/ de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/
145b2('dul ba): des ri brags su zhugs nas mi btang ba dang / ri brags kun tshigs/ ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas spangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dang dge sbyong
145b3('dul ba): go'u ta ma ni thag ring po kho na yin gyis/ ri brags 'dir ni phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri bregs bsregs kyis/ me gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang /
145b4('dul ba): gsad par ma nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag 'di ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das ri brags rnams zhugs kyis tshig na/ dgum par rdzo
145b5('dul ba): ma thogs lags so/ / ngas gsad dam/ bcom ldan 'das dgum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar/ 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthung
145b6('dul ba): lha rnams lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to/ / de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i
145b7('dul ba): phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam dang / bag la zhal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
146a1('dul ba): @so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lbu ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob
146a2('dul ba): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom
